custom_css.gtk4:
/*\ = Aliases = \*/

   @define-color
      \+f   @light_1                                       ;  @define-color
      \+F   @light_2                                       ;  @define-color
      \+g   @dark_5                                        ;  @define-color
      \-f   @dark_5                                        ;  @define-color
      \-F   @dark_4                                        ;  @define-color
      \-g   @light_1                                       ;  @define-color
   /*/*/G   shade(@window_bg_color , .82)                  ;  @define-color
   /*/*/b   @borders /*/ [Caution] Marked as compat // [Note] Auto high contrast /*/ ; @define-color

   /*/*/h   shade(@window_bg_color , .94)                  ;  @define-color
   /*/*/H   shade(@headerbar_bg_color , .82)               ;  @define-color

   /*/*/d   shade(@window_bg_color , 1.3)                  ;  @define-color

      \+v   shade(@brown_5 , 1.48)                         ;  @define-color
      \-v   shade(@brown_1 , 1.54)                         ;  @define-color

      \+c   shade(@brown_5 , 1.72)                         ;  @define-color
      \-c   shade(@brown_1 , 1.66)                         ;  @define-color
   /*/*/C   shade(@card_bg_color , .82)                    ;  @define-color

      \+a   @red_1                                         ;  @define-color
      \+A   @red_2                                         ;  @define-color
      \-a   @red_2                                         ;  @define-color
      \-A   @red_1                                         ;  @define-color
      \+s   @green_1                                       ;  @define-color
      \+S   @green_2                                       ;  @define-color
      \-s   @green_2                                       ;  @define-color
      \-S   @green_1                                       ;  @define-color
      \+w   @yellow_3                                      ;  @define-color
      \+W   @yellow_4                                      ;  @define-color
      \-w   @yellow_4                                      ;  @define-color
      \-W   @yellow_3                                      ;  @define-color
      \+e   @purple_2                                      ;  @define-color
      \+E   @purple_3                                      ;  @define-color
      \-e   @purple_3                                      ;  @define-color
      \-E   @purple_2

/*\--------------+
 #    Anchors    #
 +--------------\*/

;  link
,  button.link
   >  label
   {  background-image : linear-gradient( /*/ [Lookup] It is not shown until in “:hocus” /*/
         #0000 calc(100% - 6px)
      ,  alpha(@accent_color , .66) 0
   ); background-size : 100% calc(1em + 6px) /*/ [Awaiting] “text-decoration-thickness” property /*/
   ;  line-height : 1em /*/ [Awaiting] “lh” unit /*/
   ;  background-origin : content-box
   ;  background-clip : content-box
   ;  color : inherit /*/ [Lookup] Do not work /*/
   ;  text-decoration : none

/*\-------------+
 #    Asides    #
 +-------------\*/

;} box.vertical
+  separator
+  box.vertical
,  .sidebar-pane
,  .navigation-sidebar
   {  color
      :  @view_fg_color /*/ [Problem] Widget backgrounds in legacy apps while dark scheme /*/ ; background-color :
         @view_bg_color

;} box.vertical
+  separator
+  box.vertical
      headerbar:not(.flat) , box.vertical + separator + box.vertical
      tabbar:not(.inline) , box.vertical + separator + box.vertical
      viewswitcherbar
,  .sidebar-pane
      headerbar:not(.flat) , .sidebar-pane
      tabbar:not(.inline) , .sidebar-pane
      viewswitcherbar
,  .navigation-sidebar
      headerbar:not(.flat) , .navigation-sidebar
      tabbar:not(.inline) , .navigation-sidebar
      viewswitcherbar
   {  color
      :  @view_fg_color ; background-color :
         shade(@view_bg_color , .94)

;} .sidebar-pane
      .content-pane
,  .content-pane
      .sidebar-pane
   {  color
      :  @dialog_fg_color ; background-color :
         @dialog_bg_color

;} .sidebar-pane
      .content-pane
         headerbar:not(.flat) , .sidebar-pane .content-pane
         tabbar:not(.inline) , .sidebar-pane .content-pane
         viewswitcherbar
,  .content-pane
      .sidebar-pane
         headerbar:not(.flat) , .content-pane .sidebar-pane
         tabbar:not(.inline) , .content-pane .sidebar-pane
         viewswitcherbar
   {  color
      :  @dialog_fg_color ; background-color :
         shade(@dialog_bg_color , .94)

/*\--------------------+
 #    Interactables    #
 +--------------------\*/

;} button.suggested-action
,  switch:checked
,  checkbutton /*/ [Caution] Inappropriate descendant combinators /*/
   >  check:checked , checkbutton
   >  radio:checked
   {  box-shadow : inset 0 0 0
         1px @accent_color

;} button.opaque
   {  box-shadow : inset 0 0 0
         1px @borders

;} button.destructive-action
   {  box-shadow : inset 0 0 0
         1px @error_color

/*\----------------+
 #    Calendars    #
 +----------------\*/

;} .view
   >  calendar-view /*/ [Enhancement] :has() pseudo /*/
   {  background-color : @window_bg_color

/*\---------------+
 #     Checks     #
 +----------------+
 | Read <//uxmovement.com/forms/why-radio-buttons-and-checkboxes-cant-co-exist>
 | to understand  |
 | the motivation |
 +---------------\*/

;} :not(.selection-mode) /*/ [Awaiting] Correct “child:not(parent *)” behavior /*/
   >  check , :not(.selection-mode)
   >  radio
   {  border-radius : 4px
   ;  transform /*/ [Todo] Replace with diagonal linear gradients at quarters and half radial gradients at corners /*/
      :  rotateZ(.125turn) ; -gtk-icon-transform :
         rotateZ(-.125turn)

;} check:checked
,  radio:checked
   {  -gtk-icon-source : -gtk-icontheme(
         'object-select-symbolic'

/*\-------------+
 #    Chrome    #
 +-------------\*/

);}* { caret-color : @accent_color ;}
